title: Marisa Ronstadt, Cousin Of Linda, Spans Genres For 'Moon'
teaser: Marisa Ronstadt is the younger cousin of the famous singer, Linda Ronstadt. But she has her own band, and a new album. She talks with NPR's Scott Simon about a life in music.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
